page.title: 19 PEEBLES BELTANE FESTIVAL(2)
page.content: Second in importance is{Wednesday night.On this night,the cornet and his lass are sworn in and they and their supporters ride around the boundary of the town.They visit Neidpath Castle, ford the River Tweed,race up the golf course and complete the evening by dancing on the High Street. The week begins with a service at the Cross Kirk on the{Sunday}followed by a procession of participants. Monday is quiet with a disco held for{ Primary schoolchildren.The children of Peebles hold sports in Hay Lodge Park on{Tuesday. The Burgh Hall is the scene for {Thursday's}concert and on{Friday evening everyone lets their hair down with a fancy dress competition and parade. { Peebles Beltane Festival}is regarded as one of the best of its kind.
